original_text: But now hath he obtained a more excellent ministry, by how much also he is the mediator of a better covenant, which was established upon better promises.
korean_text: 그러나 이제 그는 더 아름다운 직분을 얻으셨으니 그는 더 좋은 약속으로 세우신 더 좋은 언약의 중보자시라

sentences.original_text: But now hath he obtained a more excellent ministry
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 이제 그는 더 탁월한 직분을 얻었습니다

sentences.original_text: by how much also he is the mediator of a better covenant
sentences.korean_translation: 얼마나 더 그가 더 좋은 언약의 중보자인 만큼

sentences.original_text: which was established upon better promises
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 더 좋은 약속 위에 세워진 것입니다
